languages.text: {n}Поспешное отвержение маршалом вашей догадки — самое верное подтверждение того, что он и сам считает версию о намеренных поисках правдивой. Однако, вероятно, не готов признаться в этом даже самому себе.{/n}

{n}The hastiness of the Marshal's rejection of your theory is the best proof that he himself considers a deliberate search to be a plausible explanation. But it seems he is unwilling to admit it, even to himself.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Поспешное отвержение маршалом вашей догадки — самое верное подтверждение того, что он и сам считает версию о намеренных поисках правдивой. Однако, вероятно, не готов признаться в этом даже самому себе.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The Marshal's hasty rejection of your theory is the best proof that he himself considers a deliberate search to be a plausible explanation. But it seems he is unwilling to admit it even to himself.{/n}

{n}The hastiness of the Marshal's rejection of your theory is the best proof that he himself considers a deliberate search to be a plausible explanation. But it seems he is unwilling to admit it, even to himself.{/n}

languages.text: {n}L'empressement avec lequel le maréchal réfute votre théorie est la preuve que lui aussi considère une recherche délibérée de la planète comme une explication plausible. Pour autant, il semble réticent à l'admettre devant autrui, et à se l'avouer à lui-même.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The hastiness of the Marshal's rejection of your theory is the best proof that he himself considers a deliberate search to be a plausible explanation. But it seems he is unwilling to admit it, even to himself.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'empressement avec lequel le maréchal réfute votre théorie est la preuve que lui aussi considère une recherche délibérée de la planète comme une explication plausible. Pour autant, il semble réticent à l'admettre devant autrui, et à se l'avouer à lui-même.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La precipitación del Mariscal al rechazar tu teoría es la mejor prueba de que considera que una búsqueda deliberada es la explicación más plausible, pero no parece dispuesto a admitirlo, ni siquiera para sus adentros.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The hastiness of the Marshal's rejection of your theory is the best proof that he himself considers a deliberate search to be a plausible explanation. But it seems he is unwilling to admit it, even to himself.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La precipitación del Mariscal al rechazar tu teoría es la mejor prueba de que considera que una búsqueda deliberada es la explicación más plausible, pero no parece dispuesto a admitirlo, ni siquiera para sus adentros.{/n}

languages.text: {n}元帅急不可待地否定了你的看法，这恰恰说明他也在怀疑这样的可能性，但他似乎根本不愿接受这样的结论。即便只是合理假设，他也不肯接受。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The hastiness of the Marshal's rejection of your theory is the best proof that he himself considers a deliberate search to be a plausible explanation. But it seems he is unwilling to admit it, even to himself.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}元帅急不可待地否定了你的看法，这恰恰说明他也在怀疑这样的可能性，但他似乎根本不愿接受这样的结论。即便只是合理假设，他也不肯接受。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Bestimmtheit, mit der der Marschall deine Theorie bestreitet, ist der beste Beweis, dass auch er eine gezielte Suche für eine plausible Erklärung hält. Allerdings scheint er sich das selbst nicht eingestehen zu wollen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The hastiness of the Marshal's rejection of your theory is the best proof that he himself considers a deliberate search to be a plausible explanation. But it seems he is unwilling to admit it, even to himself.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Bestimmtheit, mit der der Marschall deine Theorie bestreitet, ist der beste Beweis, dass auch er eine gezielte Suche für eine plausible Erklärung hält. Allerdings scheint er sich das selbst nicht eingestehen zu wollen."

languages.text: {n}マルシャルがあなたの理論を急いで否定したことは、彼自身が意図的な捜索をあり得る説明として考えていることの最良の証拠だ。しかし、彼はそれを自分自身にすら認めようとしていないようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The hastiness of the Marshal's rejection of your theory is the best proof that he himself considers a deliberate search to be a plausible explanation. But it seems he is unwilling to admit it, even to himself.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}マルシャルがあなたの理論を急いで否定したことは、彼自身が意図的な捜索をあり得る説明として考えていることの最良の証拠だ。しかし、彼はそれを自分自身にすら認めようとしていないようだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Miralay'ın teorini çarçabuk reddetmesi, kendisinin bilinçli bir keşfi makbul bir açıklama olarak gördüğünü açıkça kanıtlıyor. Gelgelelim bunu kendisine bile itiraf etmek istemiyor gibi görünüyor.{/n}
